Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2012 11:43PM jeanne3 wrote: Hi:  i am at the point in which i have  been told that chemo is the treatment necessary after my nov 2, 2011 surgery.  i am planning to get a 2nd opinnion in 2 weeks. hoping to get a different treatment plan such as no chemo necessary.  but, if i do need chemo i am under the impression that there are different dosage--strength in the chemo  and depending on the dosage that side effects might be lighter-- on an individual.  am i being naive or it does not matter on the strength of the chemo and the side effects will be the same for all.
Posts.Title: Has anyone started a Dec 2011 group? darlam mamabee
